verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [V: ate] [ARG1: a meal of prawn cocktails , sweet and sour pork , and beef short rib confit] . For dessert a dark chocolate tartlet and Häagen Dazs ice cream was served .

President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un ate a meal of prawn cocktails , sweet and sour pork , and beef short rib confit . For dessert a dark chocolate tartlet and Häagen Dazs ice cream [V: was] served .

President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un ate a meal of prawn cocktails , sweet and sour pork , and beef short rib confit . [ARG3: For dessert] [ARG2: a dark chocolate tartlet and Häagen Dazs ice cream] was [V: served] .
